common_2120_announce_01:
Next up is the second round! I’m sure you’re
ready to hear the matchup, so let’s get to it!
common_2120_ecology_02:
I hear you went out on your Treasure Hunt and
wound up becoming a Champion.[VAR 0114(002A)]
common_2120_ecology_04:
I guess I’m the homeroom teacher for two
Champion Rank students now.[VAR 0114(002A)]
common_2120_ecology_05:
I won’t lie—I’m feeling a wee bit of pressure
here![VAR 0114(002A)]
common_2120_ecology_06:
I’ve got to work hard so my students don’t
outshine me too much, huh?[VAR 0114(002A)]
common_2120_ecology_07: Well, then! Let’s get started, shall we?[VAR 0114(002A)]
common_2120_announce_04:
And the winner of this second-round battle is...
Champion [VAR TRNAME(0000)]!
common_2120_ecology_09:
Hehe. You beat me! You’re quite the strong
Trainer, aren’t you, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(002A)]
common_2120_ecology_10:
You’re more fit for the teaching profession than I
am with that boundless confidence of yours![VAR 0114(002A)]
common_2120_head_teacher_01: Mr. Jacq! Did I hear you correctly just now?![VAR 0114(000A)]
common_2120_ecology_11:
Uh-oh. Uh... Hi, Director. Are you angry with me?
Hehe...[VAR 0114(002A)]
common_2120_ecology_12:
Well, I’m going to go get yelled at. Good luck in
the coming battles![VAR 0114(002A)]
